Posts.Content: May 17, 2017 03:25PM - edited May 17, 2017 04:09PM by Tmattice I have just been diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer, I am only 33 years old and I have babies at home. They are going to start me on Letrozole, Palbociclid, and Goserelin. My doctor told me no surgery, no chemo or anything because it won't change the outcome. I'm scared because doing those things I would think gives you a better chance of living longer. I'm scared and dont don't know what to think. I need as much time as I can get cause of my babies.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed with Stage 4 Metastatic Breast cancer, Sparkybuff153 Nkb

Posts.Content: May 18, 2017 07:59PM Tmattice wrote: Thanks guys, I start the treatment tomorrow. I hope it's not to bad. My daughter's 4th birthday also tomorrow and her party on Sunday. Hope it all works out.
